title: Apple patent reveals next-generation force sensors for Apple Watch, MacBook, and iPhone
content:
Except for the trackpad on MacBooks, Apple has all but discontinued Force Touch (also known as 3D Touch) technology from its products. However, it seems that the company still has plans to somehow bring Force Touch back, as new patents reveal next-generation force sensors for Apple Watch, MacBook, and even iPhone.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple patent reveals next-generation force sensors for Apple Watch, MacBook, and iPhone appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has all but discontinued Force Touch technology from its products, but new patents reveal next-gen force sensors for Apple devices.
